description: TEHRAN – The spokesperson of the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has issued a strong condemnation of the terrorist attack targeting coal miners in Pakistan, Baluchistan province.
title: Iran strongly condemns terrorist attack on Pakistani coal miners in Baluchistan

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian representative at the UN High Council for Human Rights has described Israel's airstrike on the Iranian Red Crescent's humanitarian aid facility located at the Syrian-Lebanese border as a war crime and a violation of international humanitarian law.
title: Iran’s human rights chief decries Israeli airstrike on Syrian hospital as war crime

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi is set to depart Tehran for Baghdad on Sunday, according to Iraqi media reports.
title: Araqchi set to visit Baghdad on Sunday, Iraqi media reports

description: TEHRAN- The Acting President of Pakistan, during a conversation with the Iranian ambassador in Islamabad, highlighted the importance of strengthening political ties between the two countries.
title: Tehran, Islamabad officials vow to bolster political ties

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s ambassador to the United Nations, Amir Saeid Iravani, has strongly condemned Israel's recent airstrike on an Iranian medical facility located near the Lebanon-Syria border, calling it a clear violation of international humanitarian law and an undeniable war crime.
title: Israeli airstrike on Iranian medical facility in Lebanon an undeniable war crime: envoy

description: BEIRUT - Amidst the hostile propaganda that has failed to present Iran as a marginal party in the ongoing Israeli war on Lebanon, the trip of Iranian Parliament Speaker Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf to Lebanon and his inspection of the bombarded areas in Beirut heartened the Lebanese.
title: Qalibaf’s Lebanon visit heartens Lebanese in countering US-Zionist arrogance

description: MADRID – At a time of maximum regional tension, provoked by the genocidal actions of Israel, a public debate is emerging in Iran regarding a possible change in its nuclear doctrine.
title: The evolving debate: Iran's nuclear policy and regional security concerns

description: TEHRAN – A thick pall of smoke hung heavy over Beirut as Iranian Parliament Speaker Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf, at the controls of his own plane, touched down at Rafic Hariri Airport on Saturday.
title: For Beirut

description: TEHRAN – A thick pall of smoke hung heavy over Beirut as Iranian Parliament Speaker Mohammad Baqer Qalibaf, at the controls of his own plane, touched down at Rafic Hariri Airport on Saturday.
title: With you we will go on and triumph

description: TORONTO - A year after the launch of “Operation Al-Aqsa Flood” (OAF), the Axis of Resistance remains steadfast and firm in the battlefield, whilst the Zionist regime has yet to achieve their goals. It’s without a doubt that Hamas’s decision to launch this operation on October 7, 2023 changed the trajectory of the battlefield forever. This operation marked the beginning of the downfall of US imperialism and Zionism.
title: A Year of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood

description: TEHRAN - In an analysis, Etemad pointed to the crimes of Israel with the American support and wrote: Now it is obvious to everyone that it is not just the occupying regime that is fighting the oppressed nations.
title: US responsible for continued Israeli crimes

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian has announced that significant agreements related to energy, transportation, and regional cooperation are nearing completion.
title: Iran preparing to forge new economic alliances with neighbors, says president

description: TEHRAN – In a message to President Kais Saied of Tunisia, Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian extended his warm congratulations on Saied's re-election for a second term.
title: Pezeshkian congratulates Kais Saied on re-election as Tunisian president

description: TEHRAN – The United States has introduced a fresh wave of sanctions targeting Iran's oil and petrochemical industries, following Iran’s retaliatory missile attacks on Israeli military and intelligence facilities earlier this month.
title: U.S. imposes new sanctions on Iran’s oil, petrochemical sectors

description: TEHRAN- Since launching a brutal military campaign in Lebanon last month, Israel has concurrently carried out psychological warfare operations in a desperate attempt to tarnish the image of the Hezbollah resistance movement.
title: Hezbollah’s indomitable spirit: Painful lesson awaits Israel

description: TEHRAN- Northern Gaza is witnessing severe Israeli bombing and attacks targeting infrastructure and what remains of homes.
title: Hamas slams Nazi-like siege of north Gaza

description: Israel is the “most direct threat” to regional and global peace, and those tasked with safeguarding world peace must put an end to this threat, Recep Tayyip Erdogan told reporters aboard his returning flight from Serbia and Albania.
title: Erdogan: Israel ‘most direct threat’ to regional and global peace

description: The Palestinian Foreign Ministry has welcomed the decision by Nicaragua to sever diplomatic relations with Israel, citing its genocide in Gaza.
title: Palestine: Nicaraguan move to cut ties with Israel should serve as model for others

description: Norway on Saturday voiced strong criticism against Israel’s “brutal warfare” in Gaza, accusing Tel Aviv of violating the rules of war.
title: Norway condemns Israel for ‘brutal warfare’

description: TEHRAN- The 21st edition of the Tehran Auction, a prestigious event dedicated to contemporary art in Iran, concluded with an impressive total sales figure of 1.2 trillion rials ($2 million).
title: Contemporary Iranian art achieves $2m in sales

description: TEHRAN-Iran’s Parliament speaker Mohammad Bagher Qalibaf presented valuable cultural gifts to Tajikistan’s President Emomali Rahmon during his two-day visit to Dushanbe, October 9 and 10.
title: Iran’s Parliament speaker presents cultural gifts to Tajikistan’s President

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the Colombian author Gabriel García Márquez’s last novel “Until August”  has recently been published.
title: Gabriel García Márquez’s last novel published in Persian

description: TEHRAN- The 15th edition of the Ammar Popular Film Festival has dedicated a special award to journalists who bravely report on resistance movements, the organizers have announced.
title: Ammar festival honors resistance journalists with special award

description: TEHRAN - Bam Khatoon football team of Iran advanced to the AFC Women’s Champions League 2024/25 quarter-finals after a 2-1 win against Thailand’s College of Asian Scholars in their final Group B tie on Saturday.
title: Khatoon into AFC Women’s Champions League 2024/25 quarterfinals
Exclusive: Qalibaf meets Lebanese and Palestinian representatives

description: TEHRAN - For the first time, an unseen portrait of Naser al-Din Shah of the Qajar dynasty will be unveiled to the public.
title: Unseen portrait of Naser al-Din Shah to be unveiled in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - The restoration of the wooden doors of the Jameh Mosque of Varamin has officially commenced, marking a significant step in the extensive renovation of the 14th-century place of worship.
title: Restoration of wooden doors at 14th-century Varamin mosque begins

description: TEHRAN - Iranian artist Shahrbanoo Arabian-Larimi has won the prestigious A’ Design Award in the Fine Arts and Art Installation Design category for her remarkable decorative plate titled “The Role of Imagination”.
title: Iranian artist wins A’ Design Award for her ‘Role of Imagination’

description: TEHRAN – The Persian Gulf, the Sea of Oman, and the Caspian Sea have provided Iran with unique opportunities to drive and boost economic growth in terms of sea-based tourism.
title: Maritime heritage: key to future tourism and development

description: TEHRAN - Artificial Intelligence (AI) is no longer a thing of the future—it's here, shaping our daily lives in ways many of us don’t even realize. From improving medical diagnoses to customizing online shopping experiences, AI is being used to simplify complex tasks and help us make better decisions. However, while AI offers enormous benefits, it also comes with significant ethical challenges that we must address.
title: The ethical dilemmas of artificial intelligence
Exclusive: Body of a girl recovered after two days from rubbles

description: TEHRAN –Disaster Risk Reduction Week kicked off on Saturday and will conclude on Friday, October 18.
title: Iran marking Disaster Risk Reduction Week

description: TEHRAN - The new academic year started officially on Saturday in a ceremony at the University of Tehran with the presence of President Masoud Pezeshkian. The ministers of science and health also attended the ceremony.
title: President Pezeshkian officially starts new academic year
Beirut and Gunpowder Episode 01

description: TEHRAN - Zeinab Norouzi claimed a gold medal in the 2024 Asian Rowing Championships on Saturday.
title: Iranian rowers win medals in 2024 Asian Rowing Championships

description: TEHRAN –The Iranian Red Crescent Society (IRCS) is planning to set up another hospital in Lebanon after the Zionist regime targeted a field hospital set up by the IRCS in an airstrike on Friday.
title: Unfazed by Israeli attacks, IRCS to set up another field hospital in Lebanon

description:
TEHRAN –A delegation headed by deputy health minister Alireza Raeisi participated in the 14th Meeting of Ministers of Health in Moscow on October 10 –11. 
The participants discussed ways for enhancing cooperation in the field of health and treatment, utilizing new medical technologies, developing industries associated with production of advanced medical equipment, and improving the quality of education in health sector, IRNA reported.
title: Iran attends meeting of BRICS health ministers
Exclusive: Iranian Parliament speaker visits Beirut

description: TEHRAN – Iran futsal team moved down to sixth place in the world ranking list published on Friday.
title: Iran drop two spots in FIFA Futsal Ranking
Laboratorium. Technology from Russian scientists will help restore lost vision

description: TEHRAN- As announced by the Iranian Transport and Urban Development Ministry, 2,336.7 hectares of land have been provided for the construction of National Housing Movement units across the country in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21).
title: Over 2,330 ha of lands provided for National Housing Movement units in H1

description: TEHRAN – The new Head of Iran’s Securities and Exchange Organization (SEO) says the country needs $200 billion of investment by 2031 to achieve its economic goals, Mehr News Agency reported.
title: ‘Iran needs $200b of investment by 2031 to achieve economic goals’

description: TEHRAN – The latest data released by the Iranian Energy Ministry shows that over 40 new rural areas have been connected to the national power grid since the beginning of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20).
title: 40 rural areas connected to national power grid since late March

description: TEHRAN - Russia has proposed a new cross-border payment system to be conducted among BRICS countries to circumvent the western financial system, according to the governor of the Central Bank of Iran (CBI).
title: New cross-border payments system pitched at BRICS meeting in Moscow

description: TEHRAN – Production of petroleum products in Iran has increased by 10 percent in the sixth Iranian calendar month of Shahrivar (August 22-September 21) compared to the previous month, according to a report published by the Supervision Office of Iran’s Securities and Exchange Organization (SEO).
title: Monthly production of petroleum products rises 10%

description: TEHRAN- Iran exported $78 million of dates in the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Date export stands at $78m in 6 months

description: TEHRAN- Iran exported $78 million of dates in the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Dates worth $78m exported in H1

description: TEHRAN- The value of Iran’s steel ingots export stood at $730 million in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-Septemebr 22), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Iran’s steel ingots export stands at $730m in 6 months

description: TEHRAN- The value of Iran’s steel ingots export stood at $730 million in the first half of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-Septemebr 22), the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) reported.
title: Iran’s steel ingots export stands at $730m in H1

description: TEHRAN - In a move that has sparked widespread controversy and disappointment, the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) has decided to strip Iran of its home advantage for an upcoming 2026 World Cup qualifier against Qatar. The match, originally scheduled to be held in Iran, will now take place at a neutral venue in the United Arab Emirates due to what the AFC has described as "prevailing security concerns."
title: AFC's decision leaves Iranian Football in limbo
